project_descr: Human Rights for All – Support to the Implementation and Monitoring of the National Human Rights Strategy and Action Plan

outputs.output_descr: Overall objective of the Joint Programme (JP) is to enhance capacities of government institutions and Parliamentary Committees on Rights and Civil Integration and Legal Issues and improve mechanisms for better protection of human rights in Georgia.
